tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Products (
    product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name STRING,
    certification STRING,
    organic BOOLEAN,
    source_product_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE FoodRetailers (
    retailer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    retailer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    certification_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_certification FOREIGN KEY (certification_id) REFERENCES Certifications(certification_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    product_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    organic BOOLEAN,
    retailer_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_retailer FOREIGN KEY (retailer_id) REFERENCES FoodRetailers(retailer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Suppliers (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    supplier_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    organic_certification_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_organic_cert FOREIGN KEY (organic_certification_id) REFERENCES Certifications(certification_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    certification VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'N/A',
    organic BOOL DEFAULT false,
    retailer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (retailer_id) REFERENCES Retailers (retailer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Product_Suppliers (
    product_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    supply_chain VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (product_id, supplier_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Products (product_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES Suppliers (supplier_id)
);
